places_with_reviews.name: ITI Square

reviews.text: A square with one way towards chandipur, opposite towards angar Gadia, and the other towards Balasore town with opposite to Bhadrak road . Many types of vendors and shops are available here .
Nice place for a evening tour , U can try street food . It is lovely and affordable too.
It is one of the traffic junction, so you don't need a ticket to enter. You just need to watch traffic lights.

A square with one way towards chandipur, opposite towards angar gadia, and the other towards mid town balasore with opposite to bhadrak road. Square avail with all types of vendors. Everything can be available.
Many times traffic problem issue there and the evening time so romantic

places_with_reviews.name: Fakir Mohan Golei

reviews.text: very nice experience, humble behavior by staff nice stay...

Busy place, so much of traffic... wait wait...it is not always like that. Only at morning and evening time this place is more busy....

Other than that at occasions this place shows the night beauty with the different colors of light.

This place has everything that a cosmopolitan needs. From basic amenities to government offices, this place has all the facilities; be it India Post, railway station, grocery shops, shopping malls, healthcare units, petrol pumps, eateries etc. Well- maintained traffic is the key behind smooth transport in this area.
This place is the centre of Balasore town.this place is named after our greatest writer poet and freedom fighter FAKIR MOHAN SENAPATI.

Super service provider Titan eye Plus balasore 2. I recently visited Titan eye Plus and had a fantastic experience.The staff was incredible helpful, guiding me through a wide range of frames to find the perfect fit.A wonderful assortment of eye wear choice.

places_with_reviews.name: Rameswara Mandira(Temple)

reviews.text: If you are in balasore, once you should go there. It's a Lord Mahadev temple 🌸 Serenity and peace.They also provide Best hygienic prasad at a affordable rate. You can book in advance for Marriage ceremony. Good Parking space available.Near to Remuna golei. Cheap Transportation- you can go there by your own vehicle or by town bus 🚌 from bus stand.

Very culturally devine place...... Peace 🕊️.   Visit once you will be happy to see the environment...... Very big pond also present there..... My fab mandir in BLS.....
Har har Mahadev..... Jay Mahakal🙏

Very beautiful temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, loved and revered among the people of Baleshwar. There is adjacent temples dedicated to Goddess Parvati, Lord Radha Krishna, Lord Hanuman and a big Nandi!

One can contact the temple priests for special puja and homa, yagna, abhisheka, etc. The temple management committee manages the administrative activities very well. There is a nearby large Pond dedicated to and managed by the Temple.

Auspicious functions like Upanayan sanskar, marriage, etc. are hosted by the temple committee at affordable rates and very tasty, hygienic prasad is also available. The rate chart is attached here. Rates are very economical.

Best place to visit in Balasore. Peaceful environment ❣️ I love this place 😊
Do visit here.
Rameswaraya Namaha 🙏
Very beautiful. Prasad sebana is the best here as compared to other temples

places_with_reviews.name: Jhadeshwar Temple
places_with_reviews.address: GW4G+9Q7, Chowk, Bank Colony, Manikhamb, Balasore, Gopalgoan, Odisha 756001, India

reviews.text: There is also a Puja mandap Durga held there
This place is awesome and beautiful environment inside the temple due to a big Banyan tree.

It's the old Lord Siva temple. Within the temple premises, there are many other deities like lord Jagannath, Balabhadra, Subhadra, and Hanuman. It also has a pond inside for the use of the temple. The peaceful and spiritual consecrated place.
Old temple but not maintained properly. It need more attention from local governing body. Temple campus is not organised and cleaned. Hope there will be some improvement near future.
It's good temple but sometimes it's so crowded outside that there is no space left outside to park the vehicle. Also good Prasad is available.

places_with_reviews.name: Tarini Temple

reviews.text:
This temple is inside Balasore town in malikashpur.
This cross is known as Tarini chouk.

If you are near you can visit morning and evening time.

Nana(pujari) available in both of the time.

You can give Coconut  🥥 sindura for puja.

Overall nice and good place.
